snippet: Wall Street stocks closed down about 1 percent, as investors digested the suggestion that further monetary stimulus action from the Fed was unlikely.
abstract: Wall Street stocks close down about 1 percent, as investors digest the suggestion that further monetary stimulus action from the Fed was unlikely.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street stocks closed down about 1 percent, as investors digested the suggestion that further monetary stimulus action from the Fed was unlikely.

headline.seo: S.&P. 500 Dips After Fed Signals No New Stimulus
headline.main: Shares Dip as Fed Aims to Pull Back
headline.print_headline: Shares Dip As Fed Aims To Pull Back
